body.value:
{
"Title":"PIPELINE RUN FINISHED",
"Message":"DEMO-PIPELINE FINISHED RUNNING SUCCESSFULLY ( 2 DailyReport )",
"Color":"Green",
"DataFactoryName":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
"PipelineName":"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
"PipeLineId":"@{pipeline().RunId}",
"Time":"@{utcnow()}"
}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		{ADDRESS LINE 1} as string,
		{ADDRESS LINE 2} as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		{ADDRESS TYPE} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CusTable
Customer derive(FULL_NAME = FIRST_NAME+' '+LAST_NAME) ~> DerivedColumn1
Exists1 filter(!isNull(EMAIL),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Filter2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		PHONE,
		EMAIL,
		{ADDRESS_LINE 1} = {ADDRESS LINE 1},
		{ADDRESS_LINE 2} = {ADDRESS LINE 2},
		CITY,
		STATE,
		COUNTRY,
		ZIPCODE,
		ADDRESS_TYPE = {ADDRESS TYPE},
		FULL_NAME
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter2 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Select1, CusTable exists(Select1@CUSTOMER_ID == CusTable@CUSTOMER_ID
	&& Select1@COUNTRY == CusTable@COUNTRY
	&& Select1@STATE == CusTable@STATE
	&& Select1@ADDRESS_TYPE == CusTable@ADDRESS_TYPE,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID,
		FULL_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 = {ADDRESS_LINE 1},
		ADDRESS_LINE2 = {ADDRESS_LINE 2},
		CITY,
		STATE,
		COUNTRY,
		ZIPCODE,
		ADDRESS_TYPE
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		ADDRESS_WK as integer,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimAddress
LandingTable, DimAddress exists(LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE1 == DimAddress@ADDRESS_LINE1
	&& LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE2 == DimAddress@ADDRESS_LINE2,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exist1
Select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Exist1, DimAddress lookup(LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE1 == DimAddress@ADDRESS_LINE1
	&& LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE2 == DimAddress@ADDRESS_LINE2,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> ModifiedDate
ModifiedDate select(mapColumn(
		ADDRESS_LINE1 = LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 = LandingTable@ADDRESS_LINE2,
		CITY = LandingTable@CITY,
		STATE = LandingTable@STATE,
		COUNTRY = LandingTable@COUNTRY,
		ZIPCODE = LandingTable@ZIPCODE,
		ADDRESS_TYPE = LandingTable@ADDRESS_TYPE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ADDRESS_WK as integer,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ADDRESS_LINE1','ADDRESS_LINE2'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADDRESS_LINE1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		COUNTRY,
		ZIPCODE,
		ADDRESS_TYPE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string,
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		ADDRESS_WK as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCust
source(output(
		ADDRESS_WK as integer,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimAdd
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCus
Select3, DimCust exists(Select3@CUSTOMER_WK == DimCust@CUSTOMER_WK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCust lookup(Select3@CUSTOMER_WK == DimCust@CUSTOMER_WK
	&& Select3@ADDRESS_WK == DimCust@ADDRESS_WK,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> ModifiedDate
ModifiedDate select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK = Select3@CUSTOMER_WK,
		ADDRESS_TYPE = Select3@ADDRESS_TYPE,
		ADDRESS_WK = Select3@ADDRESS_WK,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1, DimCus lookup(source1@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCus@CUSTOMER_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		ADDRESS_LINE1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		COUNTRY,
		ZIPCODE,
		ADDRESS_TYPE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2, DimAdd lookup(Select2@ADDRESS_LINE1 == DimAdd@ADDRESS_LINE1
	&& Select2@ADDRESS_LINE2 == DimAdd@ADDRESS_LINE2,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
Lookup3 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		ADDRESS_TYPE = Select2@ADDRESS_TYPE,
		ADDRESS_WK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string,
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		ADDRESS_WK as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CUSTOMER_WK','ADDRESS_WK'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADDRESS_TYPE,
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		ADDRESS_WK,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		ZIPCODE as string,
		ADDRESS_TYPE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(CUSTOMER_ID),
	each(match(name!='CUSTOMER_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRow
DistinctRow alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
exist, DimCustomer lookup(LandingTable@FULL_NAME == DimCustomer@FULL_NAME
	&& LandingTable@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCustomer@CUSTOMER_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> ModifyDate
LandingTable, DimCustomer exists(LandingTable@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCustomer@CUSTOMER_ID
	&& LandingTable@FULL_NAME == DimCustomer@FULL_NAME,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exist
ModifyDate select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID = LandingTable@CUSTOMER_ID,
		FULL_NAME = LandingTable@FULL_NAME,
		EMAIL = LandingTable@EMAIL,
		PHONE = LandingTable@PHONE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CUSTOMER_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID,
		FULL_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PNAME as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		SUB_CATEGORY as string,
		PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		UNIT_SELL_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		CURRENCY as string,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		WAREHOUSE as string,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimOrder
LandingTable, DimOrder exists(LandingTable@ORDER_DATE == DimOrder@ORDER_DATE,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimOrder lookup(LandingTable@ORDER_DATE == DimOrder@ORDER_DATE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> ModifyDate
ModifyDate select(mapColumn(
		ORDER_DATE = LandingTable@ORDER_DATE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(ORDER_DATE),
	each(match(name!='ORDER_DATE'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Distinct
Distinct alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ORDER_DATE'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ORDER_DATE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PNAME as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		SUB_CATEGORY as string,
		PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		UNIT_SELL_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		CURRENCY as string,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		WAREHOUSE as string,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		PRODUCT_DES as string,
		UNIT_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
LandingTable, DimProduct exists(LandingTable@PRODUCT_ID == DimProduct@PRODUCT_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimProduct lookup(LandingTable@PRODUCT_ID == DimProduct@PRODUCT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> Modifydate
Modifydate select(mapColumn(
		PRODUCT_ID = LandingTable@PRODUCT_ID,
		NAME = PNAME,
		PRODUCT_DES = PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION,
		UNIT_PRICE = UNIT_SELL_PRICE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(PRODUCT_ID),
	each(match(name!='PRODUCT_ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Distinct
Distinct alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		PRODUCT_DES as string,
		UNIT_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['PRODUCT_ID','NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PRODUCT_ID,
		NAME,
		PRODUCT_DES,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		PRODUCT_NAME as string,
		TOTAL_STOCK as integer,
		REORDER_POINT as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LandingTable
source(output(
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimWarehouse
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(WAREHOUSE_ID),
	each(match(name!='WAREHOUSE_ID'), $$ = first($$)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Distinct
LandingTable, DimWarehouse exists(LandingTable@WAREHOUSE_ID == DimWarehouse@WAREHOUSE_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimWarehouse lookup(LandingTable@WAREHOUSE_ID == DimWarehouse@WAREHOUSE_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> ModifyDate
ModifyDate select(mapColumn(
		WAREHOUSE_ID = LandingTable@WAREHOUSE_ID,
		NAME = LandingTable@NAME,
		LOCATION = LandingTable@LOCATION,
		PRODUCT_NAME,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Distinct alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['WAREHOUSE_ID','NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		WAREHOUSE_ID,
		NAME,
		LOCATION,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCus
source(output(
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		PRODUCT_DES as string,
		UNIT_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
source(output(
		Day_WK as integer,
		Month_WK as integer,
		FullDate as timestamp,
		Year_Code as integer,
		Month_Code as integer,
		Month_Name as string,
		WeekDay_Code as integer,
		Day_Name as string,
		Is_WeekDay as boolean,
		NumberOfWorkDays as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDate
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PNAME as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		SUB_CATEGORY as string,
		PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		UNIT_SELL_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		CURRENCY as string,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		WAREHOUSE as string,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderDate as integer,
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		AMOUNT as decimal(10,2),
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderFact
source(output(
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimOrder
source(output(
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimWarehouse
ExistCus, DimCus lookup(source1@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCus@CUSTOMER_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCus
LookupCus select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		PNAME,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		WAREHOUSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, DimProduct lookup(Select1@PRODUCT_ID == DimProduct@PRODUCT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPro
LookupPro select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		WAREHOUSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select3, DimDate lookup(ORDER_DATE == FullDate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDate
LookupDate select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		ORDER_WK,
		WAREHOUSE,
		Day_WK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select5, OrderFact exists(Day_WK == OrderDate
	&& Select5@CUSTOMER_WK == OrderFact@CUSTOMER_WK
	&& Select5@PRODUCT_WK == OrderFact@PRODUCT_WK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsOrderFact
ExistsOrderFact, OrderFact lookup(Day_WK == OrderDate
	&& Select5@CUSTOMER_WK == OrderFact@CUSTOMER_WK
	&& Select5@PRODUCT_WK == OrderFact@PRODUCT_WK,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupFact
LookupFact derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp(),
		AMOUNT = UNIT_PRICE*Select5@QUANTITY_ORDERED) ~> ModifiedData
ModifiedData select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK = Select5@CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK = Select5@PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED = Select5@QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_WK = Select5@ORDER_WK,
		OrderDate = Day_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK = Select5@WAREHOUSE_WK,
		ModifiedDate,
